data.name: Stoire
data.detailed_description: For a long time, some sounds are heard on the stairs, that leads to the laboratory. My task is to investigate this, and find out who lives there. During your journey, you will meet rooms that are not always open. If they're open, you're lucky, because there you can find a small signal flare or just be able to hide from a mutant that will constantly pursue you.
data.about_the_game: For a long time, some sounds are heard on the stairs, that leads to the laboratory. My task is to investigate this, and find out who lives there. During your journey, you will meet rooms that are not always open. If they're open, you're lucky, because there you can find a small signal flare or just be able to hide from a mutant that will constantly pursue you.
data.short_description: For a long time, some sounds are heard on the stairs, that leads to the laboratory. My task is to investigate this, and find out who lives there..

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz or better (dual core recommended)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher (Shader Model 3 Compatible)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
